title: Old Legendary Skins Rework!
body:
Is it possible to amp up or rework some of the old legendary skins seeing that todays legendary skins have more improved technology and skin design. 
Examples of which are, firefighter tristana, gentleman chogath, corporate dr mundo, piltover customs blitzcrank, brolaf, and some more...

replies.body:
I agree, The magnificent twisted fate for example, has absolutely 0 qualities of a legendary skin, no particle effects, no voice over, if it was to be released today, it would be a 750 skin, yet they still charge 1850 for it (when its available) 

The selling point of a legendary is its new voice over (like the selling point of an ultimate is its evolving model) 

at least, gentleman cho'gath, brolaf, corporate mundo etc etc. While shit skins they still classify as legendary due to having new voice overs. Magnificent TF, piltover customs blitz, firefighter trist etc. they lack the main component of a legendary and it is wrong to sell them to us as legendaries.

Riot stated that legendary skin will 'change the feel' of a champ, and this is true for PROJECT: Yi etc etc. But last time i checked The magnificent Twisted Fate, did not change the feel of the champ whatsoever intact, cutpurse TF changes it more, and thats only a 750 skin.

But RIOT wont change these skins.
cuz riot turds, sure magnificent is visually appealing in game, but its nothing more than a red tux and a tophat
You'd think that, but then you compare it to PROJECT: Yi and suddenly it doesn't look so hot.
